This app does not access music, but iOS requires this permission for technical reasons.
Camera access is required to allow salespeople to capture and upload customer store pictures during check-in.
Access to your device's storage is required to save and manage application data and files.
This app requires access to the local network for debugging purposes
This app needs your location to track check-ins, check-outs and optimize sales routes, even when in the background.
This app needs your location to track check-ins, check-outs and optimize sales routes, even when in the background.
We need your location to track check-ins and show your position on the map while using the app.
We need access to your microphone for video recording.
We need access to your photo library to select images.
This app needs Bluetooth to function
